IV.i.3.A.1.p
.
Accepting a Fee-Based Examiner’s Report
There is no prohibition against acceptance of a VA examination report for rating purposes from a fee-based medical examiner who has previously submitted a statement on the claimant’s behalf.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Criteria for Sufficiency of Examination Reports
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
